alert.note: Alert for Natchitoches; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 09 at 4:34AM CST until January 09 at 5:15AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 AM CST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL NATCHITOCHES AND SOUTHEASTERN SABINE PARISHES... At 434 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Hornbeck, or 9 miles northwest of Anacoco, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Kisatchie. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
